metadata.name: FGF Geopolitical Risk Supercycle (GRS) Tracker
metadata.description: GRRI-based measure of country-level geopolitical and systemic risk
metadata.methodology: Global Risk Rating Index (GRRI) - 29 variables across 4 pillars

political.name: Political Risk
political.description: Governance quality, conflict intensity, and state stability

economic.name: Economic Risk
economic.description: Macroeconomic stability, trade dynamics, and institutional strength

social.name: Social Risk
social.description: Human development, inequality, and social cohesion

environmental.name: Environmental Risk
environmental.description: Climate vulnerability, transition risk, and disaster exposure
